name: Cocoa Catch
description:
Make the best cup of hot chocolate before the time runs out!

Move your mug with the arrow keys and catch as many tasty ingredients as you can. Be careful to avoid the nasty ingredients! 

This is an arcade style game made for the Winter Jam 2019. The theme was hot cocoa. Please leave a comment to tell me what you think or if there are any problems.

ENJOY!
